intro: Ardisia rigida, commonly known as the rigid ardisia, is a flowering plant species belonging to the family Myrsinaceae. It is native to tropical regions of Southeast Asia, including Malaysia and Indonesia. The plant features glossy, dark green leaves and produces small, red berries that are visually striking. It is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its attractive foliage and seasonal flowering. Ardisia rigida prefers shady, moist environments and is relatively easy to care for in a garden setting.
